title: InSituASProfile
text: basic example use InSituASProfile Package: Import data (csv files) folder combine single data frame analysis.

title: InSituASProfile
text: step cleans data frame 1) omitting acceleration values 0, 2) identify two highest acceleration values every consecutive 0.2 m/s cut starting 3 m/s, 3) create initial regression line associated preliminary plot (FALSE)

title: InSituASProfile
text: Calculate -S Profile. step uses data exported prepare_data, calculate -S Profile. plots -S Profile default (TRUE), plot showing regression line printed default (FALSE).

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: goal InSituASProfile provide easy way calculate insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based gps data concept described Morin et al. 2021 published Journal Biomechanics, DOI: 10.1016/j.jbiomech.2021.110524 walk package, please click

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: can install development version InSituASProfile GitHub :

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: basic example use InSituASProfile Package: csv files single player located folder, can use InSituASProfile::import_data function, basically list files folder, combine single data frame. need specify names velocity acceleration columns. example Catapult gps provider, process can streamlined easily using API (click example).

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: step cleans data frame 1) omitting acceleration values 0, 2) identify two highest acceleration values every consecutive 0.1 m/s cut starting 3 m/s, 3) create initial regression line associated preliminary plot (FALSE)

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: Calculate -S Profile. step uses data exported prepare_data, calculate -S Profile. plots -S Profile default (TRUE), plot showing regression line printed default (FALSE). default data cleaned using removal points outside 95 % Confidence Intervals initial regression line (ci_outlier_detection = TRUE), using Turkey Boxplot method, removes points outside IQR * 1.5 including top 2 percent points velocity bin.

title: Compute acceleration-speed profile — get_AS_Profile
text: Computes sprint acceleration profile using Confidence Interval Filtering, e.g. removal points outside 95 % CI regression line initial fit.

title: Compute acceleration-speed profile — get_AS_Profile
code: get_AS_Profile(   print_plot_regression_line = FALSE,   print_AS_plot = TRUE,   ci_outlier_detection = TRUE )

title: Compute acceleration-speed profile — get_AS_Profile
text: print_plot_regression_line logical print profile regression line, default FALSE print_AS_plot logical print profile publication ready plot, default TRUE ci_outlier_detection logical controlling whether use 95 % confidence interval Turkey Boxplot outlier detection. default TRUE meaning ci applied

title: Import data — import_data
text: Import csv files folder combine dataframe

title: Import data — import_data
text: file_directory path folder character string Velocity name velocity column, default "Velocity" Acceleration name acceleration column, default "Acceleration"

title: Import data — import_data
text: function imports csv files folder combine dataframe.

what: InsituASProfile: A package for calculating the insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based on gps data — InsituASProfile
title: InsituASProfile: A package for calculating the insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based on gps data — InsituASProfile
text: package calculates insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based gps data using method described Morin et al. 2021 published Journal Biomechanics, DOI: 10.1016/j.jbiomech.2021.110524

title: InsituASProfile: A package for calculating the insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based on gps data — InsituASProfile
text: Lasse IshC8i lasse.ishoei@gmail.com

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: Prepares dataframe provide preliminary analysis

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: x dataframe two numeric columns named "speed" "acc". speed values m/s. import function used, columns automatically bw named "speed" "acc" print_plot logical control preliminary plot printed, default TRUE. plot show initial fit model may serve determine quality GPS data sufficient.

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: function prepares input dataframe : filtering acc >= 0, filtering speed >= 3, creating speed bins 0.1 ms (suggested Cormier et al. 2023), indentifying highest two acc values speed bin. function outputs initial linear regression analysis associated scatterplot initial data inspection.

title: data simulation data set — sample_data
text: Simulation data illustrate function. Use prepare_data function. add several data frames global environment, used sa_profile function

title: data simulation data set — sample_data
text: data.frame raw GPS file output, contains two relevant columns, instantaneous speed acceleration measures. speed Instantaneous sprint speed m/s acc instantaneous acceleration m/s^2

title: data simulation data set — sample_data
text: Data soccer training session using 10hz Catapult Vector 7
